howItWorks.title: How Tipsio works in 3 steps

step1.title: 1. Your venue connects Midtrans once
step1.description: You enter your Midtrans Merchant ID and API keys. We don't hold your money ‚Äî tips go directly to your existing payment account.

step2.title: 2. We generate QR codes for staff and tables
step2.description: Print them, place on tables or staff badges. Guests scan with any phone camera.

step3.title: 3. Guests leave tips, you settle payouts
step3.description: Guests pay with GoPay, OVO, cards or QRIS via Midtrans. Tipsio calculates how much each staff member should get. You pay out in cash or bank transfer and mark payouts as done.

whereWeAre.title: Where we are now
whereWeAre.description: Tipsio is live with early venues in Bali. We're focused on making digital tips easy for guests, transparent for staff, and low‚Äëfriction for owners.
whereWeAre.point1: We integrate with Midtrans and follow their best practices.
whereWeAre.point2: We keep staff dashboards and payouts logic simple and clear.
whereWeAre.point3: We work closely with early partners to refine the product.

q1.question: Do you touch our money or hold funds?
q1.answer: No. All payments go directly to your Midtrans merchant account. Tipsio only helps you track and allocate tips to staff.

q2.question: Do guests need to install an app?
q2.answer: No. Guests just scan a QR code with their phone camera and pay via Midtrans ‚Äî GoPay, OVO, cards or QRIS.

q3.question: How do staff get paid?
q3.answer: You still pay your staff in cash or via bank transfer. Tipsio calculates how much each staff member should get and shows it in a simple payouts report.

q4.question: How much does Tipsio cost?
q4.answer: We keep our pricing simple for early partners. Midtrans fees apply as usual. Platform fee is discussed individually based on your volume.

q5.question: How long does setup take?
q5.answer: Most venues connect Midtrans, add staff and print QR codes in under 1 hour.
